___


**Mark T (True) or F (False) in each of the following sentences.**

::: {.webex-check .webex-box}


1 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["T"]'/> Holding stocks over bonds can provide a tax advantage due to the deferral of capital gains taxes until the asset is sold, which effectively lowers the capital gains tax rate. 

2 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["F"]'/> Unlevered beta measures the risk of a company's stock against that of the broader market, including the impact of a company's capital structure and leverage, while levered beta measures the market risk of a company without the impact of debt. 

3 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["T"]'/> The interest tax shield with permanent debt implies that a company with a permanent level of debt will receive a consistent tax benefit due to the deductibility of interest expenses. 

4 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["F"]'/> The effective tax advantage of debt can be calculated by multiplying the firm's interest expense by the corporate tax rate. 

5 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["T"]'/> The Optimal Capital Structure with Taxes refers to the best mix of debt and equity financing that maximizes a company's market value while minimizing its cost of capital, taking into account the tax benefits of debt financing. 

6 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["T"]'/> The tax advantage of debt arises from the fact that interest payments are reducing the overall tax burden on the firm. 

7 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["T"]'/> The Modigliani-Miller theorem with taxes states that the value of a levered firm is equal to the value of an unlevered firm plus the present value of the tax shield from debt 

8 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["F"]'/> A firm's cost of debt typically decreases as its credit rating improves, reflecting the reduced risk of default associated with higher credit ratings. 

9 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["T"]'/> The tax shield from debt is equivalent to the amount of debt multiplied by the corporate tax rate. 

10 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["T"]'/> The weighted average cost of capital (WACC) decreases as the proportion of debt in a firm's capital structure increases due to the tax shield provided by debt financing. 

11 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["T"]'/> The cost of equity typically increases as a firm's leverage ratio increases due to the higher risk perceived by equity investors. 

12 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["F"]'/> Equity financing always provides a tax shield similar to debt financing. 

13 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["T"]'/> Debt financing can lead to financial distress if a company cannot meet its debt obligations. 

14 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["F"]'/> The tax shield from debt financing is only applicable if the company is profitable and pays taxes. 

15 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["F"]'/> The Modigliani-Miller theorem without taxes states that the value of a firm is dependent on its capital structure. 

16 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["T"]'/> Tax-deductible interest on debt can make borrowing a more attractive option for companies. 

17 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["F"]'/> Interest payments on debt are not tax-deductible for corporations. 

18 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["T"]'/> An increase in the corporate tax rate generally increases the value of the interest tax shield. 

19 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["T"]'/> In the presence of corporate taxes, the value of a levered firm is higher than the value of an unlevered firm due to the tax shield provided by debt. 

20 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["F"]'/> Personal taxes have no impact on the value of a firm's debt and equity. 

21 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["T"]'/> Retained earnings do not provide a tax shield similar to that provided by debt financing. 

22 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["F"]'/> Preferred stock dividends provide the same tax benefits as interest on debt. 

23 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["T"]'/> Firms with higher marginal tax rates benefit more from the interest tax shield than firms with lower marginal tax rates. 

24 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["F"]'/> The corporate tax shield from debt financing is irrelevant in determining a firm's capital structure. 

25 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["F"]'/> Issuing new equity shares will generally increase a firm's interest tax shield. 

26 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["T"]'/> Debt financing can result in restrictive covenants that limit a company's operational flexibility. 

27 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["F"]'/> All companies, regardless of their profitability, can equally benefit from the tax shield provided by debt. 

28 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["T"]'/> A high debt ratio can increase a company's financial risk and affect its stock price volatility. 

29 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["T"]'/> Companies in highly cyclical industries might use less debt to avoid financial distress during downturns. 

30 <input class='webex-solveme nospaces ignorecase' size='1' data-answer='["F"]'/> The value of a firm's tax shield is independent of the corporate tax rate.
